com.greystripe.sdk
Interface GSAdListener

public interface GSAdListener

An interface for listeners who want to be notified of ad receipt, clicks, and dismissals. All methods are guaranteed to be called on the main UI Thread.

Method Summary
 void onAdClickthrough(GSAd ad)
          Called when the user clicks on the ad.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 void onAdCollapse(GSAd ad)
          Called after an expanded banner ad has collapsed.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 void onAdDismissal(GSAd ad)
          Called when the user skips, closes, or otherwise dismisses an ad.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 void onAdExpansion(GSAd ad)
          Called when a banner ad is about to expand, taking over the whole screen.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 void onFailedToFetchAd(GSAd ad, GSAdErrorCode error)
          Called when the ad fails and cannot be displayed.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 void onFetchedAd(GSAd ad)
          Called when the ad has loaded and can be displayed.

Always called from the UI Thread.
 

Method Detail

onFailedToFetchAd

void onFailedToFetchAd(GSAd ad,
                       GSAdErrorCode error)
Called when the ad fails and cannot be displayed.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad that failed
error - The reported reason the ad failed.

onFetchedAd

void onFetchedAd(GSAd ad)
Called when the ad has loaded and can be displayed.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad that can be displayed.

onAdClickthrough

void onAdClickthrough(GSAd ad)
Called when the user clicks on the ad.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad on which the user clicked.

onAdDismissal

void onAdDismissal(GSAd ad)
Called when the user skips, closes, or otherwise dismisses an ad.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad that the user dismissed.

onAdExpansion

void onAdExpansion(GSAd ad)
Called when a banner ad is about to expand, taking over the whole screen.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad that is about to expand.

onAdCollapse

void onAdCollapse(GSAd ad)
Called after an expanded banner ad has collapsed.

Always called from the UI Thread.

Parameters:
ad - The ad that collapsed.
